Package.Name: com.adacore.gnat
Package.Title: GNAT compiler toolchain
Package.Description: The GNAT toolchain. For building software in Ada 2012, C, and C++.

Package.Name: com.adacore.gnatstudio
Package.Title: GNAT Studio integrated development environment
Package.Description: The GNAT Studio IDE for developing SPARK, Ada, C and C++ software. Also with support for Python.

Package.Name: com.adacore.libadalang
Package.Title: Libadalang
Package.Description: Libadalang is a library for parsing and semantic analysis of Ada code. It is meant as a building block for integration into other tools. (IDE, static analyzers, etc.)

Package.Name: com.adacore.spark2014_discovery
Package.Title: SPARK toolset
Package.Description: The SPARK 2014 verifier and prover toolchain: guarantee that your software is free from run-time errors, and prove key program properties.
